front.title: Using ITU-T-based IDs for MPLS-TP Proactive Connectivity Verification

abstract.t: This document defines how to use ICC-based Multiprotocol Label Switching Transport Profil(MPLS-TP) identifiers for proactive connectivity verification (CV) analogous to RFC 6428. New TLVs are defined to support proactive CV based on identifiers following ITU-T conventions.
